Description: Instrumentation Design Drawing Set - instrument location plans installation details cable schedules
Instrumentation Technical Specification - level pressure temperature specification development
Instrumentation Design Calculations - instrument sizing calculations range selection verification
Instrumentation Data Sheet Package - level pressure temperature flow instrument data sheets
Instrumentation Installation & Test Records - calibration procedures loop check records FAT documentation
Tank Level Transmitters - guided wave radar level transmitters (3 tanks × 2 per tank redundant)
Notes: HART protocol GWR transmitters for viscous oil service

Description: Tank Level Switches - high/high-high level switches for overflow protection (3 tanks × 2 per tank)
Notes: Vibrating fork or float type switches

Description: Tank Temperature Elements - RTD assemblies with thermowells (3 tanks × 2 per tank)
Tank Pressure Transmitters - tank pressure/vacuum monitoring (3 tanks × 1 per tank)
Notes: Low pressure transmitters for atmospheric tanks

Description: Tank Temperature Transmitters - temperature transmitters (3 tanks × 1 per tank)
Railcar Unloading Flow Indicators - sight flow indicators at unloading stations (32 units)
Railcar Unloading Temperature Elements - RTD assemblies for header temperature monitoring (8 units)
Marine Loading Pressure Transmitters - loading arm and platform pressure monitoring (6 units)
Marine Loading Level Switches - sump and containment level detection (4 units)
Marine Loading Temperature Elements - product temperature monitoring (2 units)
Transfer Piping Pressure Transmitters - pump suction/discharge headers (12 units)
Transfer Piping Temperature Elements - process temperature monitoring (8 units)
Pump Vibration Transmitters - vibration monitoring for critical pumps (6 units)
Miscellaneous Process Switches - pressure and temperature switches for alarms (12 units)
Instrument Cable - multi-conductor shielded cable supply (~8000 m)
Junction Boxes - NEMA 4X stainless steel instrument junction boxes (25 units)
Notes: SS junction boxes for marine environment

Description: Instrument Tubing and Fittings - SS tubing compression fittings manifolds
Instrument Supports and Mounting - brackets stands pipe mounts weather protection
Instrument Conduit and Fittings - rigid conduit flex conduit fittings
Instrument Installation - field mounting wiring termination (106 instruments)
Instrument Cable Installation - cable pulling termination (~8000 m in tray/conduit)
Notes: Cable installation in tray and conduit

Description: Junction Box Installation - mounting wiring terminal block installation (25 units)
Instrument Conduit Installation - conduit and support installation
Instrument Tubing Installation - tubing routing and connection
Instrument Calibration - field calibration and verification (106 instruments)
Loop Testing - point-to-point loop verification and testing (106 loops)
Construction Indirects - field supervision QA/QC scaffolding temporary works (factor-based)
EPCM / Project Management - PKG-20 allocation (factor-based)
Procurement Services - instrument vendor qualification expediting (factor-based)
Commissioning - instrument commissioning loop validation system integration testing
